LanguageData.VPE_Healing.label: psychic healing
LanguageData.VPE_BlockBleeding.label: psychic stabilization
LanguageData.VPE_BlockBleeding.description: Psychically-induced stasis that stops any bleeding.
LanguageData.VPE_Immunity.label: psychic immunity
LanguageData.VPE_Overshield.label: psychic overshield
LanguageData.VPE_Overshield.description: Psychically-induced personal skipbarrier. Impenetrable by ranged projectiles.
LanguageData.VPE_GuardianSkipBarrier.label: guardian skipbarrier
LanguageData.VPE_GuardianSkipBarrier.description: Psychically crafted defensive barrier that generates large amounts of psychic heat in order to sustain itself.
LanguageData.VPE_RegrowLimbs.label: psychic regeneration
LanguageData.VPE_RegrowLimbs.description: Psychically-induced tissue regeneration, which can close open wounds and regenerate missing body parts.
LanguageData.VPE_Regenerating.label: regenerating
